special abilities.name: Augmetics
special abilities.description: Gain a +10 bonus to Logistics Tests to obtain bionic replacements and implants.

special abilities.name: Demolitions
special abilities.description: The regiment gains a +10 bonus to Logistics tests to obtain grenades, missiles, explosives and special tank ammunition.

special abilities.name: Scavengers
special abilities.description: May gain a +10 bonus to any Logistics Tests. Any doubles on a roll with this bonus draws unwanted attention.

special abilities.name: Warrior Weapons
special abilities.description: Regiment exchanges their Main Weapon for a Common Low-Tech weapon and a laspistol with two charge packs.

special abilities.name: Well-Provisioned
special abilities.description: Increases the number of clips for the main weapon and weeks of rations by 2 and an additional grenade of each type. Gain +10 to all Logistics tests to obtain fuel and parts for vehicles.
